webscript.shortname: Add group or user to a group
webscript.description:
This is a supplement to the POST method. Adds group(s) or user(s) to a group. This webscript will not create a sub group if one does not already exist.
You must have "administrator" privileges to modify groups.
If the authority is for a group and does not exist then it will not be created.
The webscript returns Status_OK and returns the group.
